title: I think there may be a typo on the Universe page
body:
On Lux's page,

"The light inside is what makes me different, and I'm always careful where I shine it."

**~Garen**

Sorry, but that just doesn't seem quite right.

replies.body:
Ooops myb! Fixing this now. 

Thanks for letting me know :D!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot usher voice,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=21zkztQu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-27T23:22:26.008+0000)
>
> Ooops myb! Fixing this now. 
> 
> Thanks for letting me know :D!

Nope pretty sure Garen said that #starguardianGarenconfirmed
